name: DOLCE Template XMLVar Rename
content:
<layout>
  <fonts>
    <swf src="/files/template_asset/[[TEMPLATE_ID]]/chevrolet_template_fonts.swf"/>
  </fonts>
  <css><![CDATA[
      [[css_600]]
    ]]></css>
  <button backgroundColors="0xdddddf" backgroundVisible="true" clickEvent="onEntireUnitClick" height="600" mouseChildren="true" overEvent="onLogoOver" useHandCursor="true" width="300">
    <container>
      <image completeEvent="slide3Ready" errorEvent="slide3Ready" src="[[slide3_background_src_600]]" x="[[slide3_background_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_background_y_600]]"/>
      <image src="[[slide3_image1_src_600]]" x="[[slide3_image1_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_image1_y_600]]"/>
      <text-html color="[[vehicleName_color_600]]" font="Louis Regular" leading="[[vehicleName_leading_600]]" size="[[vehicleName_size_600]]" width="[[vehicleName_width_600]]" x="[[vehicleName_x_600]]" y="[[vehicleName_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[vehicleName_text_600]]]]></text-html>
      <rect backgroundAlphas="1" backgroundColors="[[slide3_line_color_600]]" backgroundVisible="true" height="1" width="[[slide3_line1_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_line1_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_line1_y_600]]"/>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold Italic" leading="[[slide3_text1_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text1_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text1_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text1_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text1_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text1_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text2_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text2_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text2_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text2_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text2_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text2_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text3_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text3_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text3_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text3_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text3_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text3_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text4_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text4_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text4_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text4_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text4_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text4_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text5_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text5_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text5_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text5_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text5_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text5_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text6_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text6_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text6_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text6_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text6_y_600]]"><![CDATA[[[slide3_text6_600]]]]></text-html>
      <text-html color="[[slide3_text_color_600]]" font="Louis Bold" leading="[[slide3_text7_leading_600]]" size="[[slide3_text7_size_600]]" width="[[slide3_text7_width_600]]" x="[[slide3_text7_x_600]]" y="[[slide3_text7_y_600]]
author: Shane Kearney
